original_text: The second cherub also measured ten cubits, for the two cherubim were identical in size and shape.
korean_text: 다른 그룹도 십 규빗이니 그 두 그룹은 같은 크기와 같은 모양이요

sentences.original_text: The second cherub also measured ten cubits,
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 그룹도 또한 열 규빗을 측정했고,

sentences.original_text: for the two cherubim were identical
